attributes.action: Immediate Universal Benefits payments to every household that has no Key Workers
attributes.additional_details: Most people able to continue working and unable to survive without earnings will be forced to go to work and go viral with Coronavirus instead of going Viral supporting the NHS with isolation. Please make this available so that more people do not die and more people can be helped by NHS.
attributes.background: Easy online applications and payments to families within a week so that total lockdown and isolation can be managed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
